outputs.output_descr: The Project  aims to raise the awareness of the young male population of the country as conscious and responsible citizens who are respectful to the rights of one another and are more sensitive about protection of their physical environment. To this end, the Project will be composed of two main components: i) Institutional Capacity Development addressing the institutional skills and capabilities, which will be needed to establish and maintain the learning systems in a sustainable manner; ii) Individual Capacity Enhancement for the  enhancement of individual capacities of the conscripts through delivering training programmes. At the end of the project, around 10.000 conscripts per year will be gained more knowledge and skills for modern social life and institutional capacity for the sustainable provision of knowledge, skills and awareness on human rights, gender equality and women's rights, children's right, legal empowerment, protection of the environment and general health care will be increased

project_descr: Project aims to raise the awareness of the young male population as conscious and responsible citizens who are respectful to the rights of one another
